fgeo.tool
  • Functions Index
  • News
  • fgeo

Reference version 0.0.0.9002

Manipulate dataframes by adding columns

add_status_tree

Define the status of a tree based on the status of its stems.

add_subquad

Add a quadrat variable to a dataframe based based on qx and qy coordinates.

add_var add_lxly add_qxqy add_index add_col_row add_hectindex add_quad add_col_row2

Add columns to a dataframe.

Manipulate dataframes by operating on rows

row_collapse_censusid

Collapse the values of CensusID.

row_discard_twice_dead

Remove trees found dead in both the last and previous last censuses.

row_filter_status row_keep_alive_stem row_keep_alive_tree

Filter a (fgeo) dataframe by the status of each stem or tree.

row_top

Filter a data set by matching n values from the head (or tail) of a variable.

Manipulate lists of dataframes

ls_csv_df

Save each dataframe in a list to a different .csv file.

ls_join_df

Full-join all or some dataframes from a list of dataframes

ls_list_spreadsheets

Read an excel workbook and store each spreadsheet as a dataframe in a list.

ls_name_df

Mutate a list of dataframes to add column with the name of the list element.

Manipulate dataframes

recode_subquad

Recode subquadrat labels.

Manipulate strings

str_as_tidy_names

Create a names-friendly version of a string (lowercase and with no spaces).

str_suffix_match

Suffix a strings where a vector exactly matches one specific string.

Manipulate names

nms_has_any nms_detect nms_extract_all nms_extract1

Functions to detect and extract names.

nms_extract_anycase

Find a name exactly matching a string but regardless of case.

nms_lowercase nms_restore

Lower and restore names.

nms_restore_newvar

Restore the names of a dataframe to which a new variable has been added.

nms_tidy

Create tidy names that are lowercase and have no empty spaces.

Sanitize multiple data structures

type_ensure

Ensure the specific columns of a dataframe have a particular type.

type_vft type_taxa

Help to read ForestGEO data safely, with consistent column type.

fill_na

Fill NA's with a single filler.

restructure_elev

If necessary, pull elevation data and rename x and y to gx and gy.

Create field forms

fieldforms_header

Header for fieldforms.

fieldforms_output

Create field forms forms.

fieldforms_prepare

Prepare data to create field forms.

Functions for developers: Checks

check_crucial_names

Check if an object contains specific names.

check_unique check_unique_vector

Report if a vector or a variable of a dataframe is duplicated.

Functions for developers: Miscellaneous

exists_in_pkg

Test if an object exists in the namespace of a package.

guess_plotdim

Guess plot dimensions.

Datasets

top4quad top1quad

Data sets for examples; adapted from bciex::bci12vft_mini.
